'''Ryszard I. Derdziński''' (born [[1974]]) is a Polish artist, linguist and translator. He is the editor of the magazines Simbelmynë and Gwaihir, co-editor of [https://elendilion.pl Elendilion.pl] and other Tolkien-based websites. He specializes in Tolkien linguistics and researching of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s biography and philosophy. In online forums he usually has the alias '''Galadhorn'''.

==Author==
* ''[[The Sindarin Dictionary]]''

==Translator==
* ''The Lord of the Rings'' film books (Polish, consultant)
* ''[[Untangling Tolkien]]'' by Muza Publishers (Polish)
* ''[[The Art of The Hobbit]]'' by Amber Publishers (Polish)
*  [[Appendices]] of ''The Lord of the Rings'' by Amber Publishers (Polish)
* ''[[Appendix D]] and [[Appendix E|E]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' by Muza Publishers (Polish)
* ''[[The Nature of Middle-earth]]'' by Zysk i S-ka (Polish)
